meanings.sent1: She finalized her decision to go to the park.
meanings.sent2: The team finalized their project before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: After much debate, they finally finalized their plan to have a picnic.
meanings.sent4: The chef finalized the recipe by adding a pinch of salt.
meanings.sent5: The teacher finalized the grades, marking the end of the school year.
